summary: An ordinance relating to the construction, maintenance and operation of a double-deck cantilevered elevated platform projecting from abutting property and overhanging a portion of the west side of First Avenue South and extending northerly of Lander Street and the east side of Utah Avenue extending northerly of Lander Street and double-deck overhead walk and pedestrian crossing over Utah Avenue near Lander Street; and specifying the terms and conditions of the grant therefor to Sears, Roebuck and Company.
